name: Terry SERRANT, Appellant v. The PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Serrant v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Terry SERRANT, Appellant v. The PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 23rd day of February, 2012, the above captioned appeal is quashed for failure to file a brief.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
39 A.3d 989
Terry SERRANT, Appellant v. The PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 23, 2012.
